name: mhm-automated-tests
description: Test suite to validate features of the Mental Health Match web app.

scripts.test:monitor:dev: cypress run --headed --browser chrome --config-file cypress/env/dev.json --spec cypress/integration/workflows/**/*spec.js && cypress run --headed --browser firefox --config-file cypress/env/dev.json --spec cypress/integration/workflows/**/*spec.js
scripts.test:ci:dev: cypress run --headless --browser chrome --config-file cypress/env/dev.json --spec cypress/integration/workflows/**/*spec.js && cypress run --headless --browser chrome --config-file cypress/env/dev.json --spec cypress/integration/workflows/**/*spec.js
scripts.test:monitor:qa: cypress run --headed --browser chrome --config-file cypress/env/qa.json --spec cypress/integration/workflows/**/*spec.js --spec cypress/integration/pages/*spec.js && cypress run --headed --browser firefox --config-file cypress/env/qa.json --spec cypress/integration/workflows/**/*spec.js --spec cypress/integration/pages/*spec.js
scripts.test:ci:qa: cypress run --headless --browser chrome --config-file cypress/env/qa.json --spec cypress/integration/workflows/**/*spec.js --spec cypress/integration/pages/*spec.js && cypress run --headless --browser firefox --config-file cypress/env/qa.json --spec cypress/integration/workflows/**/*spec.js --spec cypress/integration/pages/*spec.js
scripts.test:monitor:prod: cypress run --headed --browser chrome --config-file cypress/env/prod.json --spec cypress/integration/workflows/**/*spec.js && cypress run --headed --browser firefox --config-file cypress/env/prod.json --spec cypress/integration/workflows/**/*spec.js
scripts.test:ci:prod: cypress run --headless --browser chrome --config-file cypress/env/prod.json --spec cypress/integration/workflows/**/*spec.js && cypress run --headless --browser firefox --config-file cypress/env/prod.json --spec cypress/integration/workflows/**/*spec.js

author: LaDell Erby
